name: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense
productInfo: With a 3.5 mm audio jack, you can plug in the Razer Nari Ultimate to other devices such as your mobile phone or console, and enjoy the same immersive experience. No third-party application or pre-programming is needed to activate Razer HyperSense. This means you get to feel advanced haptics on any device, whether you’re gaming, listening to music, or watching a movie.
